name: Camera Movement On Note
description:
For those with heart issues.
Toggles sudden camera movements when a character plays a note.

name: Minimal UI
description: Toggles UI elements like Accuracy, Misses and Timer.

name: Elapsed + Left Timer
description: If enabled, the timer will display both the elapsed time and the remaining time.

name: Gimmick Warnings
description: Toggles Warnings shown on songs with gimmicks.

name: Dark Mode
description:
If enabled, the window header will be dark.
(Credits to T-Bar, only happens in songs!)
